Issue.creator: bharadwajambati1
Issue.summary: Launch prometheus server for System Test Suite
Issue.description: And, make sure it is stated in the documentation (confirmed: find "metrics" in fabric-test/tools/operator/networkInput.md, in the networkspec file readme), when running k8s system tests or systestsuite, that user must start their cluster and start their prometheus server themselves (if they want to use prometheus for metrics) before running the k8s system tests.
